    • addUser

      public void addUser(User user, FirebaseManager.FirebaseCallback callback)
      Add a new user document to the "userse" collection in Firestore.
      Parameters:
      user - the user object to be added
      callback - a callback to handle success or failures

    • updateUser

      public void updateUser(String userId, Map<String,Object> updates, FirebaseManager.FirebaseCallback callback)
      Update an existing user's field in Firestore
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user document to update
      updates - the map of fields and their new values
      callback - a callback to handle success or failure

    • getUser

      public void getUser(String userId, Consumer<User> onSuccess, Consumer<Exception> onError)
      Retrieve a single user document from the "users" collection.
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user to retrieve
      onSuccess - a callback with the User object if it is found
      onError - a callback with an exception if User is not found or failure

    • getAllEvents

      public void getAllEvents(Consumer<List<EventAdmin>> onSuccess, Consumer<Exception> onError)
      Retrieve all documents from "events" collection in Firestore, and converts them into a list of Event objects.
      Parameters:
      onSuccess - a callback with the list of events if successful
      onError - a callback with an exception if operation fails
